name: Flawer!
description:
ES | En este clásico plataformero 2D tu objetivo es llegar al final del camino para ver que es esa luz.

Espero que lo disfruten, este juego está hecho con amor.

EN | In this classic 2D platformer your goal is to get to the end of the road to see what is that light.

Hope you enjoy, this game is made with love.
